bill.title: A report of the Senate Committee on Ethics concerning the conduct of Senator Stanley C. Rosenberg (pursuant to Senate Order – Senate, No. 2228)
bill.description: A report of the Senate Committee on Ethics concerning the conduct of Senator Stanley C. Rosenberg (pursuant to Senate Order – Senate, No. 2228)

history.action: Reported from the committee on Senate Ethics
Appendix A - so much as relates a communication from Stanley C. Rosenberg relative to his leave of absence as President of the Senate (see S2510A)

Appendix B - so much as relates to the Senate Order relative to acceptance of the communication from Stanley C. Rosenberg relative to his leave of absence from the duties of the Office of the President (see S2510B)
Appendix C - so much as relates to the Senate Order relative to the question of the conduct of Senator Stanley C. Rosenberg (see S2510C)

Appendix D - so much as relates to the Senate Order relative to the recusal of Senator Stanley C. Rosenberg and his staff from all decisions relating to investigations of Senator Rosenberg’s conduct or that of his spouse (see S2510D)
Appendix E - so much as relates to the statement of Senate Committee on Ethics Chairman Rodrigues (see S2510E)
Appendix F - so much as relates to the press release of Senate Committee on Ethics retaining a special investigator (see S2510F)
Appendix G - so much as relates to the further statement of the Senate Committee on Ethics (see S2510G)
Appendix H - so much as relates to the Report of Special Investigation in the matter of Massachusetts Senate President Stanley Rosenberg (see S2510H)

Appendix I - so much as relates to Resolutions resolving the investigation into the conduct of the Honorable Stanley C. Rosenberg, Senator from the Hampshire, Franklin and Worcester District (see S2510I)
